data.description: Manipulate IP tables rules in Perl
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides a good, solid core with modules to provide
    access to most of the match and target modules that
    netfilter/iptables provide. It uses the libiptc library code to
    provide a fast interface to iptables, but has been built from the
    ground up specifically to interface with Perl.
